00117 static int countEditBoneChildren(ListBase *list, EditBone *parent)
00118 {
00119     EditBone *ebone;
00120     int count = 0;
00121     
00122     for (ebone = list->first; ebone; ebone = ebone->next)
00123     {
00124         if (ebone->parent == parent)
00125         {
00126             count++;
00127         }
00128     }
00129     
00130     return count;
00131 }
00132 
00133 static EditBone* nextEditBoneChild(ListBase *list, EditBone *parent, int n)
00134 {
00135     EditBone *ebone;
00136     
00137     for (ebone = list->first; ebone; ebone = ebone->next)
00138     {
00139         if (ebone->parent == parent)
00140         {
00141             if (n == 0)
00142             {
00143                 return ebone;
00144             }
00145             n--;
00146         }
00147     }
00148     
00149     return NULL;
00150 }

00152 static void getEditBoneRollUpAxis(EditBone *bone, float roll, float up_axis[3])
00153 {
00154     float mat[3][3], nor[3];
00155 
00156     sub_v3_v3v3(nor, bone->tail, bone->head);
00157     
00158     vec_roll_to_mat3(nor, roll, mat);
00159     copy_v3_v3(up_axis, mat[2]);
00160 }
00161 
00162 static float rollBoneByQuatAligned(EditBone *bone, float old_up_axis[3], float qrot[4], float qroll[4], float aligned_axis[3])
00163 {
00164     float nor[3], new_up_axis[3], x_axis[3], z_axis[3];
00165     
00166     copy_v3_v3(new_up_axis, old_up_axis);
00167     mul_qt_v3(qrot, new_up_axis);
00168     
00169     sub_v3_v3v3(nor, bone->tail, bone->head);
00170     
00171     cross_v3_v3v3(x_axis, nor, aligned_axis);
00172     cross_v3_v3v3(z_axis, x_axis, nor);
00173     
00174     normalize_v3(new_up_axis);
00175     normalize_v3(x_axis);
00176     normalize_v3(z_axis);
00177     
00178     if (dot_v3v3(new_up_axis, x_axis) < 0)
00179     {
00180         negate_v3(x_axis);
00181     }
00182     
00183     if (dot_v3v3(new_up_axis, z_axis) < 0)
00184     {
00185         negate_v3(z_axis);
00186     }
00187     
00188     if (angle_normalized_v3v3(x_axis, new_up_axis) < angle_normalized_v3v3(z_axis, new_up_axis))
00189     {
00190         rotation_between_vecs_to_quat(qroll, new_up_axis, x_axis); /* set roll rotation quat */
00191         return ED_rollBoneToVector(bone, x_axis, FALSE);
00192     }
00193     else
00194     {
00195         rotation_between_vecs_to_quat(qroll, new_up_axis, z_axis); /* set roll rotation quat */
00196         return ED_rollBoneToVector(bone, z_axis, FALSE);
00197     }
00198 }
00199 
00200 static float rollBoneByQuatJoint(RigEdge *edge, RigEdge *previous, float qrot[4], float qroll[4], float up_axis[3])
00201 {
00202     if (previous == NULL)
00203     {
00204         /* default to up_axis if no previous */
00205         return rollBoneByQuatAligned(edge->bone, edge->up_axis, qrot, qroll, up_axis);
00206     }
00207     else
00208     {
00209         float new_up_axis[3];
00210         float vec_first[3], vec_second[3], normal[3];
00211         
00212         if (previous->bone)
00213         {
00214             sub_v3_v3v3(vec_first, previous->bone->tail, previous->bone->head);
00215         } 
00216         else if (previous->prev->bone)
00217         {
00218             sub_v3_v3v3(vec_first, edge->bone->head, previous->prev->bone->tail);
00219         }
00220         else
00221         {
00222             /* default to up_axis if first bone in the chain is an offset */
00223             return rollBoneByQuatAligned(edge->bone, edge->up_axis, qrot, qroll, up_axis);
00224         }
00225         
00226         sub_v3_v3v3(vec_second, edge->bone->tail, edge->bone->head);
00227     
00228         normalize_v3(vec_first);
00229         normalize_v3(vec_second);
00230         
00231         cross_v3_v3v3(normal, vec_first, vec_second);
00232         normalize_v3(normal);
00233         
00234         axis_angle_to_quat(qroll, vec_second, edge->up_angle);
00235         
00236         mul_qt_v3(qroll, normal);
00237             
00238         copy_v3_v3(new_up_axis, edge->up_axis);
00239         mul_qt_v3(qrot, new_up_axis);
00240         
00241         normalize_v3(new_up_axis);
00242         
00243         /* real qroll between normal and up_axis */
00244         rotation_between_vecs_to_quat(qroll, new_up_axis, normal);
00245 
00246         return ED_rollBoneToVector(edge->bone, normal, FALSE);
00247     }
00248 }
00249 
00250 float rollBoneByQuat(EditBone *bone, float old_up_axis[3], float qrot[4])
00251 {
00252     float new_up_axis[3];
00253     
00254     copy_v3_v3(new_up_axis, old_up_axis);
00255     mul_qt_v3(qrot, new_up_axis);
00256     
00257     return ED_rollBoneToVector(bone, new_up_axis, FALSE);
00258 }

00262 static void RIG_freeRigArc(BArc *arc)
00263 {
00264     BLI_freelistN(&((RigArc*)arc)->edges);

00266 
00267 void RIG_freeRigGraph(BGraph *rg)
00268 {
00269     RigGraph *rigg = (RigGraph*)rg;
00270     BNode *node;
00271     BArc *arc;
00272     
00273 #ifdef USE_THREADS
00274     BLI_destroy_worker(rigg->worker);
00275 #endif
00276     
00277     if (rigg->link_mesh)
00278     {
00279         REEB_freeGraph(rigg->link_mesh);
00280     }
00281     
00282     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00283     {
00284         RIG_freeRigArc(arc);
00285     }
00286     BLI_freelistN(&rg->arcs);
00287     
00288     for (node = rg->nodes.first; node; node = node->next)
00289     {
00290         BLI_freeNode(rg, (BNode*)node);
00291     }
00292     BLI_freelistN(&rg->nodes);
00293     
00294     BLI_freelistN(&rigg->controls);
00295 
00296     BLI_ghash_free(rigg->bones_map, NULL, NULL);
00297     BLI_ghash_free(rigg->controls_map, NULL, NULL);
00298     
00299     if (rigg->flag & RIG_FREE_BONELIST)
00300     {
00301         BLI_freelistN(rigg->editbones);
00302         MEM_freeN(rigg->editbones);
00303     }
00304     
00305     MEM_freeN(rg);
00306 }

00310 static RigGraph *newRigGraph(void)
00311 {
00312     RigGraph *rg;
00313     int totthread;
00314     
00315     rg = MEM_callocN(sizeof(RigGraph), "rig graph");
00316     
00317     rg->head = NULL;
00318     
00319     rg->bones_map = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_strhash, BLI_ghashutil_strcmp, "newRigGraph bones gh");
00320     rg->controls_map = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_strhash, BLI_ghashutil_strcmp, "newRigGraph cont gh");
00321     
00322     rg->free_arc = RIG_freeRigArc;
00323     rg->free_node = NULL;
00324     
00325 #ifdef USE_THREADS
00326 //  if (G.scene->r.mode & R_FIXED_THREADS)
00327 //  {
00328 //      totthread = G.scene->r.threads;
00329 //  }
00330 //  else
00331 //  {
00332         totthread = BLI_system_thread_count();
00333 //  }
00334     
00335     rg->worker = BLI_create_worker(exec_retargetArctoArc, totthread, 20); /* fix number of threads */
00336 #endif
00337     
00338     return rg;
00339 }

00364 {

00366     node = MEM_callocN(sizeof(RigNode), "rig node");
00367     BLI_addtail(&rg->nodes, node);
00368 
00369     copy_v3_v3(node->p, p);
00370     node->degree = 1;
00371     node->arcs = NULL;

00373     arc->head = node;

00375     return node;

00407 
00408 static void RIG_appendEdgeToArc(RigArc *arc, RigEdge *edge)
00409 {
00410     BLI_addtail(&arc->edges, edge);
00411 
00412     if (edge->prev == NULL)
00413     {
00414         copy_v3_v3(edge->head, arc->head->p);
00415     }
00416     else
00417     {
00418         RigEdge *last_edge = edge->prev;
00419         copy_v3_v3(edge->head, last_edge->tail);
00420         RIG_calculateEdgeAngles(last_edge, edge);
00421     }
00422     
00423     edge->length = len_v3v3(edge->head, edge->tail);
00424     
00425     arc->length += edge->length;
00426     
00427     arc->count += 1;
00428 }
00429 
00430 static void RIG_addEdgeToArc(RigArc *arc, float tail[3], EditBone *bone)
00431 {
00432     RigEdge *edge;
00433 
00434     edge = MEM_callocN(sizeof(RigEdge), "rig edge");
00435 
00436     copy_v3_v3(edge->tail, tail);
00437     edge->bone = bone;
00438     
00439     if (bone)
00440     {
00441         getEditBoneRollUpAxis(bone, bone->roll, edge->up_axis);
00442     }
00443     
00444     RIG_appendEdgeToArc(arc, edge);
00445 }

00448 static void renameTemplateBone(char *name, char *template_name, ListBase *editbones, char *side_string, char *num_string)
00449 {
00450     int i, j;
00451     
00452     for (i = 0, j = 0; i < (MAXBONENAME-1) && j < (MAXBONENAME-1) && template_name[i] != '\0'; i++)
00453     {
00454         if (template_name[i] == '&')
00455         {
00456             if (template_name[i+1] == 'S' || template_name[i+1] == 's')
00457             {
00458                 j += sprintf(name + j, "%s", side_string);
00459                 i++;
00460             }
00461             else if (template_name[i+1] == 'N' || template_name[i+1] == 'n')
00462             {
00463                 j += sprintf(name + j, "%s", num_string);
00464                 i++;
00465             }
00466             else
00467             {
00468                 name[j] = template_name[i];
00469                 j++;
00470             }
00471         }
00472         else
00473         {
00474             name[j] = template_name[i];
00475             j++;
00476         }
00477     }
00478     
00479     name[j] = '\0';
00480     
00481     unique_editbone_name(editbones, name, NULL);
00482 }
00483 
00484 static RigControl *cloneControl(RigGraph *rg, RigGraph *src_rg, RigControl *src_ctrl, GHash *ptr_hash, char *side_string, char *num_string)
00485 {
00486     RigControl *ctrl;
00487     char name[MAXBONENAME];
00488     
00489     ctrl = newRigControl(rg);
00490     
00491     copy_v3_v3(ctrl->head, src_ctrl->head);
00492     copy_v3_v3(ctrl->tail, src_ctrl->tail);
00493     copy_v3_v3(ctrl->up_axis, src_ctrl->up_axis);
00494     copy_v3_v3(ctrl->offset, src_ctrl->offset);
00495     
00496     ctrl->tail_mode = src_ctrl->tail_mode;
00497     ctrl->flag = src_ctrl->flag;
00498 
00499     renameTemplateBone(name, src_ctrl->bone->name, rg->editbones, side_string, num_string);
00500     ctrl->bone = duplicateEditBoneObjects(src_ctrl->bone, name, rg->editbones, src_rg->ob, rg->ob);
00501     ctrl->bone->flag &= ~(BONE_TIPSEL|BONE_SELECTED|BONE_ROOTSEL);
00502     BLI_ghash_insert(ptr_hash, src_ctrl->bone, ctrl->bone);
00503     
00504     ctrl->link = src_ctrl->link;
00505     ctrl->link_tail = src_ctrl->link_tail;
00506     
00507     return ctrl;
00508 }
00509 
00510 static RigArc *cloneArc(RigGraph *rg, RigGraph *src_rg, RigArc *src_arc, GHash *ptr_hash, char *side_string, char *num_string)
00511 {
00512     RigEdge *src_edge;
00513     RigArc  *arc;
00514     
00515     arc = newRigArc(rg);
00516     
00517     arc->head = BLI_ghash_lookup(ptr_hash, src_arc->head);
00518     arc->tail = BLI_ghash_lookup(ptr_hash, src_arc->tail);
00519     
00520     arc->head->degree++;
00521     arc->tail->degree++;
00522     
00523     arc->length = src_arc->length;
00524 
00525     arc->count = src_arc->count;
00526     
00527     for (src_edge = src_arc->edges.first; src_edge; src_edge = src_edge->next)
00528     {
00529         RigEdge *edge;
00530     
00531         edge = MEM_callocN(sizeof(RigEdge), "rig edge");
00532 
00533         copy_v3_v3(edge->head, src_edge->head);
00534         copy_v3_v3(edge->tail, src_edge->tail);
00535         copy_v3_v3(edge->up_axis, src_edge->up_axis);
00536         
00537         edge->length = src_edge->length;
00538         edge->angle = src_edge->angle;
00539         edge->up_angle = src_edge->up_angle;
00540         
00541         if (src_edge->bone != NULL)
00542         {
00543             char name[MAXBONENAME];
00544             renameTemplateBone(name, src_edge->bone->name, rg->editbones, side_string, num_string);
00545             edge->bone = duplicateEditBoneObjects(src_edge->bone, name, rg->editbones, src_rg->ob, rg->ob);
00546             edge->bone->flag &= ~(BONE_TIPSEL|BONE_SELECTED|BONE_ROOTSEL);
00547             BLI_ghash_insert(ptr_hash, src_edge->bone, edge->bone);
00548         }
00549 
00550         BLI_addtail(&arc->edges, edge);
00551     }
00552     
00553     return arc;
00554 }
00555 
00556 static RigGraph *cloneRigGraph(RigGraph *src, ListBase *editbones, Object *ob, char *side_string, char *num_string)
00557 {
00558     GHash   *ptr_hash;  
00559     RigNode *node;
00560     RigArc  *arc;
00561     RigControl *ctrl;
00562     RigGraph *rg;
00563     
00564     ptr_hash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "cloneRigGraph gh");
00565 
00566     rg = newRigGraph();
00567     
00568     rg->ob = ob;
00569     rg->editbones = editbones;
00570     
00571     preEditBoneDuplicate(rg->editbones); /* prime bones for duplication */
00572     preEditBoneDuplicate(src->editbones); /* prime bones for duplication */
00573     
00574     /* Clone nodes */
00575     for (node = src->nodes.first; node; node = node->next)
00576     {
00577         RigNode *cloned_node = newRigNode(rg, node->p);
00578         BLI_ghash_insert(ptr_hash, node, cloned_node);
00579     }
00580     
00581     rg->head = BLI_ghash_lookup(ptr_hash, src->head);
00582     
00583     /* Clone arcs */
00584     for (arc = src->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00585     {
00586         cloneArc(rg, src, arc, ptr_hash, side_string, num_string);
00587     }
00588     
00589     /* Clone controls */
00590     for (ctrl = src->controls.first; ctrl; ctrl = ctrl->next)
00591     {
00592         cloneControl(rg, src, ctrl, ptr_hash, side_string, num_string);
00593     }
00594     
00595     /* Relink bones properly */
00596     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00597     {
00598         RigEdge *edge;
00599         
00600         for (edge = arc->edges.first; edge; edge = edge->next)
00601         {
00602             if (edge->bone != NULL)
00603             {
00604                 EditBone *bone;
00605                 
00606                 updateDuplicateSubtargetObjects(edge->bone, src->editbones, src->ob, rg->ob);
00607 
00608                 if (edge->bone->parent)
00609                 {               
00610                     bone = BLI_ghash_lookup(ptr_hash, edge->bone->parent);
00611         
00612                     if (bone != NULL)
00613                     {
00614                         edge->bone->parent = bone;
00615                     }
00616                     else
00617                     {
00618                         /* disconnect since parent isn't cloned
00619                          * this will only happen when cloning from selected bones 
00620                          * */
00621                         edge->bone->flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
00622                     }
00623                 }
00624             }
00625         }
00626     }
00627     
00628     for (ctrl = rg->controls.first; ctrl; ctrl = ctrl->next)
00629     {
00630         EditBone *bone;
00631         
00632         updateDuplicateSubtargetObjects(ctrl->bone, src->editbones, src->ob, rg->ob);
00633 
00634         if (ctrl->bone->parent)
00635         {
00636             bone = BLI_ghash_lookup(ptr_hash, ctrl->bone->parent);
00637             
00638             if (bone != NULL)
00639             {
00640                 ctrl->bone->parent = bone;
00641             }
00642             else
00643             {
00644                 /* disconnect since parent isn't cloned
00645                  * this will only happen when cloning from selected bones 
00646                  * */
00647                 ctrl->bone->flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
00648             }
00649         }
00650 
00651         ctrl->link = BLI_ghash_lookup(ptr_hash, ctrl->link);
00652         ctrl->link_tail = BLI_ghash_lookup(ptr_hash, ctrl->link_tail);
00653     }
00654     
00655     BLI_ghash_free(ptr_hash, NULL, NULL);
00656     
00657     return rg;
00658 }
00659 
00660 
00661 /*******************************************************************************************************/
00662 
00663 static void RIG_calculateEdgeAngles(RigEdge *edge_first, RigEdge *edge_second)
00664 {
00665     float vec_first[3], vec_second[3];
00666     
00667     sub_v3_v3v3(vec_first, edge_first->tail, edge_first->head); 
00668     sub_v3_v3v3(vec_second, edge_second->tail, edge_second->head);
00669 
00670     normalize_v3(vec_first);
00671     normalize_v3(vec_second);
00672     
00673     edge_first->angle = angle_normalized_v3v3(vec_first, vec_second);
00674     
00675     if (edge_second->bone != NULL)
00676     {
00677         float normal[3];
00678 
00679         cross_v3_v3v3(normal, vec_first, vec_second);
00680         normalize_v3(normal);
00681 
00682         edge_second->up_angle = angle_normalized_v3v3(normal, edge_second->up_axis);
00683     }
00684 }
00685 
00686 /************************************ CONTROL BONES ****************************************************/
00687 
00688 static void RIG_addControlBone(RigGraph *rg, EditBone *bone)
00689 {
00690     RigControl *ctrl = newRigControl(rg);
00691     ctrl->bone = bone;
00692     copy_v3_v3(ctrl->head, bone->head);
00693     copy_v3_v3(ctrl->tail, bone->tail);
00694     getEditBoneRollUpAxis(bone, bone->roll, ctrl->up_axis);
00695     ctrl->tail_mode = TL_NONE;
00696     
00697     BLI_ghash_insert(rg->controls_map, bone->name, ctrl);
00698 }
00699 
00700 static int RIG_parentControl(RigControl *ctrl, EditBone *link)
00701 {
00702     if (link)
00703     {
00704         float offset[3];
00705         int flag = 0;
00706         
00707         sub_v3_v3v3(offset, ctrl->bone->head, link->head);
00708 
00709         /* if root matches, check for direction too */      
00710         if (dot_v3v3(offset, offset) < 0.0001f)
00711         {
00712             float vbone[3], vparent[3];
00713             
00714             flag |= RIG_CTRL_FIT_ROOT;
00715             
00716             sub_v3_v3v3(vbone, ctrl->bone->tail, ctrl->bone->head);
00717             sub_v3_v3v3(vparent, link->tail, link->head);
00718             
00719             /* test for opposite direction */
00720             if (dot_v3v3(vbone, vparent) > 0)
00721             {
00722                 float nor[3];
00723                 float len;
00724                 
00725                 cross_v3_v3v3(nor, vbone, vparent);
00726                 
00727                 len = dot_v3v3(nor, nor);
00728                 if (len < 0.0001f)
00729                 {
00730                     flag |= RIG_CTRL_FIT_BONE;
00731                 }
00732             }
00733         }
00734         
00735         /* Bail out if old one is automatically better */
00736         if (flag < ctrl->flag)
00737         {
00738             return 0;
00739         }
00740         
00741         /* if there's already a link
00742          *  overwrite only if new link is higher in the chain */
00743         if (ctrl->link && flag == ctrl->flag)
00744         {
00745             EditBone *bone = NULL;
00746             
00747             for (bone = ctrl->link; bone; bone = bone->parent)
00748             {
00749                 /* if link is in the chain, break and use that one */
00750                 if (bone == link)
00751                 {
00752                     break;
00753                 }
00754             }
00755             
00756             /* not in chain, don't update link */
00757             if (bone == NULL)
00758             {
00759                 return 0;
00760             }
00761         }
00762         
00763         
00764         ctrl->link = link;
00765         ctrl->flag = flag;
00766         
00767         copy_v3_v3(ctrl->offset, offset);
00768         
00769         return 1;
00770     }
00771     
00772     return 0;
00773 }
00774 
00775 static void RIG_reconnectControlBones(RigGraph *rg)
00776 {
00777     RigControl *ctrl;
00778     int change = 1;
00779     
00780     /* first pass, link to deform bones */
00781     for (ctrl = rg->controls.first; ctrl; ctrl = ctrl->next)
00782     {
00783         bPoseChannel *pchan;
00784         bConstraint *con;
00785         int found = 0;
00786         
00787         /* DO SOME MAGIC HERE */
00788         for (pchan= rg->ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next)
00789         {
00790             for (con= pchan->constraints.first; con; con= con->next) 
00791             {
00792                 bConstraintTypeInfo *cti= constraint_get_typeinfo(con);
00793                 ListBase targets = {NULL, NULL};
00794                 bConstraintTarget *ct;
00795                 
00796                 /* constraint targets */
00797                 if (cti && cti->get_constraint_targets)
00798                 {
00799                     int target_index;
00800                     
00801                     cti->get_constraint_targets(con, &targets);
00802                     
00803                     for (target_index = 0, ct= targets.first; ct; target_index++, ct= ct->next)
00804                     {
00805                         if ((ct->tar == rg->ob) && strcmp(ct->subtarget, ctrl->bone->name) == 0)
00806                         {
00807                             /* SET bone link to bone corresponding to pchan */
00808                             EditBone *link = BLI_ghash_lookup(rg->bones_map, pchan->name);
00809                             
00810                             /* Making sure bone is in this armature */
00811                             if (link != NULL)
00812                             {
00813                                 /* for pole targets, link to parent bone instead, if possible */
00814                                 if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC && target_index == 1)
00815                                 {
00816                                     if (link->parent && BLI_ghash_haskey(rg->bones_map, link->parent->name))
00817                                     {
00818                                         link = link->parent;
00819                                     }
00820                                 }
00821                                 
00822                                 found = RIG_parentControl(ctrl, link);
00823                             }
00824                         }
00825                     }
00826                     
00827                     if (cti->flush_constraint_targets)
00828                         cti->flush_constraint_targets(con, &targets, 0);
00829                 }
00830             }
00831         }
00832 
00833         /* if not found yet, check parent */
00834         if (found == 0)
00835         {       
00836             if (ctrl->bone->parent)
00837             {
00838                 /* make sure parent is a deforming bone
00839                  * NULL if not
00840                  *  */
00841                 EditBone *link = BLI_ghash_lookup(rg->bones_map, ctrl->bone->parent->name);
00842                 
00843                 found = RIG_parentControl(ctrl, link);
00844             }
00845             
00846             /* check if bone is not superposed on another one */
00847             {
00848                 RigArc *arc;
00849                 RigArc *best_arc = NULL;
00850                 EditBone *link = NULL;
00851                 
00852                 for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00853                 {
00854                     RigEdge *edge;
00855                     for (edge = arc->edges.first; edge; edge = edge->next)
00856                     {
00857                         if (edge->bone)
00858                         {
00859                             int fit = 0;
00860                             
00861                             fit = len_v3v3(ctrl->bone->head, edge->bone->head) < 0.0001f;
00862                             fit = fit || len_v3v3(ctrl->bone->tail, edge->bone->tail) < 0.0001f;
00863                             
00864                             if (fit)
00865                             {
00866                                 /* pick the bone on the arc with the lowest symmetry level
00867                                  * means you connect control to the trunk of the skeleton */
00868                                 if (best_arc == NULL || arc->symmetry_level < best_arc->symmetry_level)
00869                                 {
00870                                     best_arc = arc;
00871                                     link = edge->bone;
00872                                 }
00873                             }
00874                         }
00875                     }
00876                 }
00877                 
00878                 found = RIG_parentControl(ctrl, link);
00879             }
00880         }
00881         
00882         /* if not found yet, check child */     
00883         if (found == 0)
00884         {
00885             RigArc *arc;
00886             RigArc *best_arc = NULL;
00887             EditBone *link = NULL;
00888             
00889             for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00890             {
00891                 RigEdge *edge;
00892                 for (edge = arc->edges.first; edge; edge = edge->next)
00893                 {
00894                     if (edge->bone && edge->bone->parent == ctrl->bone)
00895                     {
00896                         /* pick the bone on the arc with the lowest symmetry level
00897                          * means you connect control to the trunk of the skeleton */
00898                         if (best_arc == NULL || arc->symmetry_level < best_arc->symmetry_level)
00899                         {
00900                             best_arc = arc;
00901                             link = edge->bone;
00902                         }
00903                     }
00904                 }
00905             }
00906             
00907             found = RIG_parentControl(ctrl, link);
00908         }
00909 
00910     }
00911     
00912     
00913     /* second pass, make chains in control bones */
00914     while (change)
00915     {
00916         change = 0;
00917         
00918         for (ctrl = rg->controls.first; ctrl; ctrl = ctrl->next)
00919         {
00920             /* if control is not linked yet */
00921             if (ctrl->link == NULL)
00922             {
00923                 bPoseChannel *pchan;
00924                 bConstraint *con;
00925                 RigControl *ctrl_parent = NULL;
00926                 RigControl *ctrl_child;
00927                 int found = 0;
00928 
00929                 if (ctrl->bone->parent)
00930                 {
00931                     ctrl_parent = BLI_ghash_lookup(rg->controls_map, ctrl->bone->parent->name);
00932                 }
00933 
00934                 /* check constraints first */
00935                 
00936                 /* DO SOME MAGIC HERE */
00937                 for (pchan= rg->ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next)
00938                 {
00939                     for (con= pchan->constraints.first; con; con= con->next) 
00940                     {
00941                         bConstraintTypeInfo *cti= constraint_get_typeinfo(con);
00942                         ListBase targets = {NULL, NULL};
00943                         bConstraintTarget *ct;
00944                         
00945                         /* constraint targets */
00946                         if (cti && cti->get_constraint_targets)
00947                         {
00948                             cti->get_constraint_targets(con, &targets);
00949                             
00950                             for (ct= targets.first; ct; ct= ct->next)
00951                             {
00952                                 if ((ct->tar == rg->ob) && strcmp(ct->subtarget, ctrl->bone->name) == 0)
00953                                 {
00954                                     /* SET bone link to ctrl corresponding to pchan */
00955                                     RigControl *link = BLI_ghash_lookup(rg->controls_map, pchan->name);
00956 
00957                                     /* if owner is a control bone, link with it */                                  
00958                                     if (link && link->link)
00959                                     {
00960                                         RIG_parentControl(ctrl, link->bone);
00961                                         found = 1;
00962                                         break;
00963                                     }
00964                                 }
00965                             }
00966                             
00967                             if (cti->flush_constraint_targets)
00968                                 cti->flush_constraint_targets(con, &targets, 0);
00969                         }
00970                     }
00971                 }           
00972 
00973                 if (found == 0)
00974                 {
00975                     /* check if parent is already linked */
00976                     if (ctrl_parent && ctrl_parent->link)
00977                     {
00978                         RIG_parentControl(ctrl, ctrl_parent->bone);
00979                         change = 1;
00980                     }
00981                     else
00982                     {
00983                         /* check childs */
00984                         for (ctrl_child = rg->controls.first; ctrl_child; ctrl_child = ctrl_child->next)
00985                         {
00986                             /* if a child is linked, link to that one */
00987                             if (ctrl_child->link && ctrl_child->bone->parent == ctrl->bone)
00988                             {
00989                                 RIG_parentControl(ctrl, ctrl_child->bone);
00990                                 change = 1;
00991                                 break;
00992                             }
00993                         }
00994                     }
00995                 }
00996             }
00997         }
00998     }
00999     
01000     /* third pass, link control tails */
01001     for (ctrl = rg->controls.first; ctrl; ctrl = ctrl->next)
01002     {
01003         /* fit bone already means full match, so skip those */
01004         if ((ctrl->flag & RIG_CTRL_FIT_BONE) == 0)
01005         {
01006             GHashIterator ghi;
01007             
01008             /* look on deform bones first */
01009             BLI_ghashIterator_init(&ghi, rg->bones_map);
01010             
01011             for ( ; !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(&ghi); BLI_ghashIterator_step(&ghi))
01012             {
01013                 EditBone *bone = (EditBone*)BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(&ghi);
01014                 
01015                 /* don't link with parent */
01016                 if (bone->parent != ctrl->bone)
01017                 {
01018                     if (len_v3v3(ctrl->bone->tail, bone->head) < 0.01f)
01019                     {
01020                         ctrl->tail_mode = TL_HEAD;
01021                         ctrl->link_tail = bone;
01022                         break;
01023                     }
01024                     else if (len_v3v3(ctrl->bone->tail, bone->tail) < 0.01f)
01025                     {
01026                         ctrl->tail_mode = TL_TAIL;
01027                         ctrl->link_tail = bone;
01028                         break;
01029                     }
01030                 }
01031             }
01032             
01033             /* if we haven't found one yet, look in control bones */
01034             if (ctrl->tail_mode == TL_NONE)
01035             {
01036             }
01037         }
01038     }
01039     
01040 }
01041 
01042 /*******************************************************************************************************/
01043 
01044 static void RIG_joinArcs(RigGraph *rg, RigNode *node, RigArc *joined_arc1, RigArc *joined_arc2)
01045 {
01046     RigEdge *edge, *next_edge;
01047     
01048     /* ignore cases where joint is at start or end */
01049     if (joined_arc1->head == joined_arc2->head || joined_arc1->tail == joined_arc2->tail)
01050     {
01051         return;
01052     }
01053     
01054     /* swap arcs to make sure arc1 is before arc2 */
01055     if (joined_arc1->head == joined_arc2->tail)
01056     {
01057         RigArc *tmp = joined_arc1;
01058         joined_arc1 = joined_arc2;
01059         joined_arc2 = tmp;
01060     }
01061     
01062     for (edge = joined_arc2->edges.first; edge; edge = next_edge)
01063     {
01064         next_edge = edge->next;
01065         
01066         RIG_appendEdgeToArc(joined_arc1, edge);
01067     }
01068     
01069     joined_arc1->tail = joined_arc2->tail;
01070     
01071     joined_arc2->edges.first = joined_arc2->edges.last = NULL;
01072     
01073     BLI_removeArc((BGraph*)rg, (BArc*)joined_arc2);
01074     
01075     BLI_removeNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)node);
01076 }
01077 
01078 static void RIG_removeNormalNodes(RigGraph *rg)
01079 {
01080     RigNode *node, *next_node;
01081     
01082     for (node = rg->nodes.first; node; node = next_node)
01083     {
01084         next_node = node->next;
01085         
01086         if (node->degree == 2)
01087         {
01088             RigArc *arc, *joined_arc1 = NULL, *joined_arc2 = NULL;
01089             
01090             for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
01091             {
01092                 if (arc->head == node || arc->tail == node)
01093                 {
01094                     if (joined_arc1 == NULL)
01095                     {
01096                         joined_arc1 = arc;
01097                     }
01098                     else
01099                     {
01100                         joined_arc2 = arc;
01101                         break;
01102                     }
01103                 }
01104             }
01105             
01106             RIG_joinArcs(rg, node, joined_arc1, joined_arc2);
01107         }
01108     }
01109 }
01110 
01111 static void RIG_removeUneededOffsets(RigGraph *rg)
01112 {
01113     RigArc *arc;
01114     
01115     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
01116     {
01117         RigEdge *first_edge, *last_edge;
01118         
01119         first_edge = arc->edges.first;
01120         last_edge = arc->edges.last;
01121         
01122         if (first_edge->bone == NULL)
01123         {
01124             if (first_edge->bone == NULL && len_v3v3(first_edge->tail, arc->head->p) <= 0.001f)
01125             {
01126                 BLI_remlink(&arc->edges, first_edge);
01127                 MEM_freeN(first_edge);
01128             }
01129             else if (arc->head->degree == 1)
01130             {
01131                 RigNode *new_node = (RigNode*)BLI_FindNodeByPosition((BGraph*)rg, first_edge->tail, 0.001f);
01132                 
01133                 if (new_node)
01134                 {
01135                     BLI_remlink(&arc->edges, first_edge);
01136                     MEM_freeN(first_edge);
01137                     BLI_replaceNodeInArc((BGraph*)rg, (BArc*)arc, (BNode*)new_node, (BNode*)arc->head);
01138                 }
01139                 else
01140                 {
01141                     RigEdge *next_edge = first_edge->next;
01142     
01143                     if (next_edge)
01144                     {
01145                         BLI_remlink(&arc->edges, first_edge);
01146                         MEM_freeN(first_edge);
01147                         
01148                         copy_v3_v3(arc->head->p, next_edge->head);
01149                     }
01150                 }
01151             }
01152             else
01153             {
01154                 /* check if all arc connected start with a null edge */
01155                 RigArc *other_arc;
01156                 for (other_arc = rg->arcs.first; other_arc; other_arc = other_arc->next)
01157                 {
01158                     if (other_arc != arc)
01159                     {
01160                         RigEdge *test_edge;
01161                         if (other_arc->head == arc->head)
01162                         {
01163                             test_edge = other_arc->edges.first;
01164                             
01165                             if (test_edge->bone != NULL)
01166                             {
01167                                 break;
01168                             }
01169                         }
01170                         else if (other_arc->tail == arc->head)
01171                         {
01172                             test_edge = other_arc->edges.last;
01173                             
01174                             if (test_edge->bone != NULL)
01175                             {
01176                                 break;
01177                             }
01178                         }
01179                     }
01180                 }
01181                 
01182                 if (other_arc == NULL)
01183                 {
01184                     RigNode *new_node = (RigNode*)BLI_FindNodeByPosition((BGraph*)rg, first_edge->tail, 0.001);
01185                     
01186                     if (new_node)
01187                     {
01188                         /* remove null edge in other arcs too */
01189                         for (other_arc = rg->arcs.first; other_arc; other_arc = other_arc->next)
01190                         {
01191                             if (other_arc != arc)
01192                             {
01193                                 RigEdge *test_edge;
01194                                 if (other_arc->head == arc->head)
01195                                 {
01196                                     BLI_replaceNodeInArc((BGraph*)rg, (BArc*)other_arc, (BNode*)new_node, (BNode*)other_arc->head);
01197                                     test_edge = other_arc->edges.first;
01198                                     BLI_remlink(&other_arc->edges, test_edge);
01199                                     MEM_freeN(test_edge);
01200                                 }
01201                                 else if (other_arc->tail == arc->head)
01202                                 {
01203                                     BLI_replaceNodeInArc((BGraph*)rg, (BArc*)other_arc, (BNode*)new_node, (BNode*)other_arc->tail);
01204                                     test_edge = other_arc->edges.last;
01205                                     BLI_remlink(&other_arc->edges, test_edge);
01206                                     MEM_freeN(test_edge);
01207                                 }
01208                             }
01209                         }
01210                         
01211                         BLI_remlink(&arc->edges, first_edge);
01212                         MEM_freeN(first_edge);
01213                         BLI_replaceNodeInArc((BGraph*)rg, (BArc*)arc, (BNode*)new_node, (BNode*)arc->head);
01214                     }
01215                     else
01216                     {
01217                         RigEdge *next_edge = first_edge->next;
01218         
01219                         if (next_edge)
01220                         {
01221                             BLI_remlink(&arc->edges, first_edge);
01222                             MEM_freeN(first_edge);
01223                             
01224                             copy_v3_v3(arc->head->p, next_edge->head);
01225                             
01226                             /* remove null edge in other arcs too */
01227                             for (other_arc = rg->arcs.first; other_arc; other_arc = other_arc->next)
01228                             {
01229                                 if (other_arc != arc)
01230                                 {
01231                                     RigEdge *test_edge;
01232                                     if (other_arc->head == arc->head)
01233                                     {
01234                                         test_edge = other_arc->edges.first;
01235                                         BLI_remlink(&other_arc->edges, test_edge);
01236                                         MEM_freeN(test_edge);
01237                                     }
01238                                     else if (other_arc->tail == arc->head)
01239                                     {
01240                                         test_edge = other_arc->edges.last;
01241                                         BLI_remlink(&other_arc->edges, test_edge);
01242                                         MEM_freeN(test_edge);
01243                                     }
01244                                 }
01245                             }
01246                         }
01247                     }
01248                 }
01249             }
01250         }
01251         
01252         if (last_edge->bone == NULL)
01253         {
01254             if (len_v3v3(last_edge->head, arc->tail->p) <= 0.001f)
01255             {
01256                 BLI_remlink(&arc->edges, last_edge);
01257                 MEM_freeN(last_edge);
01258             }
01259             else if (arc->tail->degree == 1)
01260             {
01261                 RigNode *new_node = (RigNode*)BLI_FindNodeByPosition((BGraph*)rg, last_edge->head, 0.001f);
01262                 
01263                 if (new_node)
01264                 {
01265                     RigEdge *previous_edge = last_edge->prev;
01266                     
01267                     BLI_remlink(&arc->edges, last_edge);
01268                     MEM_freeN(last_edge);
01269                     BLI_replaceNodeInArc((BGraph*)rg, (BArc*)arc, (BNode*)new_node, (BNode*)arc->tail);
01270                     
01271                     /* set previous angle to 0, since there's no following edges */
01272                     if (previous_edge)
01273                     {
01274                         previous_edge->angle = 0;
01275                     }
01276                 }
01277                 else
01278                 {
01279                     RigEdge *previous_edge = last_edge->prev;
01280     
01281                     if (previous_edge)
01282                     {
01283                         BLI_remlink(&arc->edges, last_edge);
01284                         MEM_freeN(last_edge);
01285                         
01286                         copy_v3_v3(arc->tail->p, previous_edge->tail);
01287                         previous_edge->angle = 0;
01288                     }
01289                 }
01290             }
01291         }
01292     }
01293 }
01294 
01295 static void RIG_arcFromBoneChain(RigGraph *rg, ListBase *list, EditBone *root_bone, RigNode *starting_node, int selected)
01296 {
01297     EditBone *bone, *last_bone = root_bone;
01298     RigArc *arc = NULL;
01299     int contain_head = 0;
01300     
01301     for (bone = root_bone; bone; bone = nextEditBoneChild(list, bone, 0))
01302     {
01303         int nb_children;
01304         
01305         if (selected == 0 || (bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED))
01306         { 
01307             if ((bone->flag & BONE_NO_DEFORM) == 0)
01308             {
01309                 BLI_ghash_insert(rg->bones_map, bone->name, bone);
01310             
01311                 if (arc == NULL)
01312                 {
01313                     arc = newRigArc(rg);
01314                     
01315                     if (starting_node == NULL)
01316                     {
01317                         starting_node = newRigNodeHead(rg, arc, root_bone->head);
01318                     }
01319                     else
01320                     {
01321                         addRigNodeHead(rg, arc, starting_node);
01322                     }
01323                 }
01324                 
01325                 if (bone->parent && (bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0)
01326                 {
01327                     RIG_addEdgeToArc(arc, bone->head, NULL);
01328                 }
01329                 
01330                 RIG_addEdgeToArc(arc, bone->tail, bone);
01331                 
01332                 last_bone = bone;
01333                 
01334                 if (strcmp(bone->name, "head") == 0)
01335                 {
01336                     contain_head = 1;
01337                 }
01338             }
01339             else if ((bone->flag & BONE_EDITMODE_LOCKED) == 0) /* ignore locked bones */
01340             {
01341                 RIG_addControlBone(rg, bone);
01342             }
01343         }
01344         
01345         nb_children = countEditBoneChildren(list, bone);
01346         if (nb_children > 1)
01347         {
01348             RigNode *end_node = NULL;
01349             int i;
01350             
01351             if (arc != NULL)
01352             {
01353                 end_node = newRigNodeTail(rg, arc, bone->tail);
01354             }
01355             else
01356             {
01357                 end_node = newRigNode(rg, bone->tail);
01358             }
01359 
01360             for (i = 0; i < nb_children; i++)
01361             {
01362                 root_bone = nextEditBoneChild(list, bone, i);
01363                 RIG_arcFromBoneChain(rg, list, root_bone, end_node, selected);
01364             }
01365             
01366             /* arc ends here, break */
01367             break;
01368         }
01369     }
01370     
01371     /* If the loop exited without forking */
01372     if (arc != NULL && bone == NULL)
01373     {
01374         newRigNodeTail(rg, arc, last_bone->tail);
01375     }
01376 
01377     if (contain_head)
01378     {
01379         rg->head = arc->tail;
01380     }
01381 }
01382 
01383 /*******************************************************************************************************/
01384 static void RIG_findHead(RigGraph *rg)
01385 {
01386     if (rg->head == NULL)
01387     {
01388         if (BLI_countlist(&rg->arcs) == 1)
01389         {
01390             RigArc *arc = rg->arcs.first;
01391             
01392             rg->head = (RigNode*)arc->head;
01393         }
01394         else
01395         {
01396             RigArc *arc;
01397             
01398             for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
01399             {
01400                 RigEdge *edge = arc->edges.last;
01401                 
01402                 if (edge->bone->flag & (BONE_TIPSEL|BONE_SELECTED))
01403                 {
01404                     rg->head = arc->tail;
01405                     break;
01406                 }
01407             }
01408         }
01409         
01410         if (rg->head == NULL)
01411         {
01412             rg->head = rg->nodes.first;
01413         }
01414     }
01415 }
01416 
01417 /*******************************************************************************************************/
01418 
01419 static void RIG_printNode(RigNode *node, const char name[])
01420 {
01421     printf("%s %p %i <%0.3f, %0.3f, %0.3f>\n", name, (void *)node, node->degree, node->p[0], node->p[1], node->p[2]);
01422     
01423     if (node->symmetry_flag & SYM_TOPOLOGICAL)
01424     {
01425         if (node->symmetry_flag & SYM_AXIAL)
01426             printf("Symmetry AXIAL\n");
01427         else if (node->symmetry_flag & SYM_RADIAL)
01428             printf("Symmetry RADIAL\n");
01429             
01430         print_v3("symmetry axis", node->symmetry_axis);
01431     }
01432 }
01433 
01434 void RIG_printArcBones(RigArc *arc)
01435 {
01436     RigEdge *edge;
01437 
01438     for (edge = arc->edges.first; edge; edge = edge->next)
01439     {
01440         if (edge->bone)
01441             printf("%s ", edge->bone->name);
01442         else
01443             printf("---- ");
01444     }
01445     printf("\n");
01446 }
01447 
01448 static void RIG_printCtrl(RigControl *ctrl, char *indent)
01449 {
01450     char text[128];
01451     
01452     printf("%sBone: %s\n", indent, ctrl->bone->name);
01453     printf("%sLink: %s\n", indent, ctrl->link ? ctrl->link->name : "!NONE!");
01454     
01455     BLI_snprintf(text, sizeof(text), "%soffset", indent);
01456     print_v3(text, ctrl->offset);
01457     
01458     printf("%sFlag: %i\n", indent, ctrl->flag);
01459 }
01460 
01461 static void RIG_printLinkedCtrl(RigGraph *rg, EditBone *bone, int tabs)
01462 {
01463     RigControl *ctrl;
01464     char indent[64];
01465     char *s = indent;
01466     int i;
01467     
01468     for (i = 0; i < tabs; i++)
01469     {
01470         s[0] = '\t';
01471         s++;
01472     }
01473     s[0] = 0;
01474     
01475     for (ctrl = rg->controls.first; ctrl; ctrl = ctrl->next)
01476     {
01477         if (ctrl->link == bone)
01478         {
01479             RIG_printCtrl(ctrl, indent);
01480             RIG_printLinkedCtrl(rg, ctrl->bone, tabs + 1);
01481         }
01482     }
01483 }
01484 
01485 void RIG_printArc(RigGraph *rg, RigArc *arc)
01486 {
01487     RigEdge *edge;
01488 
01489     RIG_printNode((RigNode*)arc->head, "head");
01490 
01491     for (edge = arc->edges.first; edge; edge = edge->next)
01492     {
01493         printf("\tinner joints %0.3f %0.3f %0.3f\n", edge->tail[0], edge->tail[1], edge->tail[2]);
01494         printf("\t\tlength %f\n", edge->length);
01495         printf("\t\tangle %f\n", edge->angle * 180 / M_PI);
01496         if (edge->bone)
01497         {
01498             printf("\t\t%s\n", edge->bone->name);
01499             RIG_printLinkedCtrl(rg, edge->bone, 3);
01500         }
01501     }   
01502     printf("symmetry level: %i flag: %i group %i\n", arc->symmetry_level, arc->symmetry_flag, arc->symmetry_group);
01503 
01504     RIG_printNode((RigNode*)arc->tail, "tail");
01505 }
01506 
01507 void RIG_printGraph(RigGraph *rg)
01508 {
01509     RigArc *arc;
01510 
01511     printf("---- ARCS ----\n");
01512     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
01513     {
01514         RIG_printArc(rg, arc);  
01515         printf("\n");
01516     }
01517 
01518     if (rg->head)
01519     {
01520         RIG_printNode(rg->head, "HEAD NODE:");
01521     }
01522     else
01523     {
01524         printf("HEAD NODE: NONE\n");
01525     }   
01526 }

01528 /*******************************************************************************************************/
01529 
01530 RigGraph *RIG_graphFromArmature(const bContext *C, Object *ob, bArmature *arm)
01531 {
01532     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01533     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01534     EditBone *ebone;
01535     RigGraph *rg;
01536 
01537     rg = newRigGraph();
01538     
01539     if (obedit == ob)
01540     {
01541         rg->editbones = ((bArmature *)obedit->data)->edbo;
01542     }
01543     else
01544     {
01545         rg->editbones = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ListBase), "EditBones");
01546         make_boneList(rg->editbones, &arm->bonebase, NULL, NULL);
01547         rg->flag |= RIG_FREE_BONELIST;
01548     }
01549     
01550     rg->ob = ob;
01551 
01552     /* Do the rotations */
01553     for (ebone = rg->editbones->first; ebone; ebone=ebone->next) {
01554         if (ebone->parent == NULL)
01555         {
01556             RIG_arcFromBoneChain(rg, rg->editbones, ebone, NULL, 0);
01557         }
01558     }
01559     
01560     BLI_removeDoubleNodes((BGraph*)rg, 0.001);
01561     
01562     RIG_removeNormalNodes(rg);
01563     
01564     RIG_removeUneededOffsets(rg);
01565     
01566     BLI_buildAdjacencyList((BGraph*)rg);
01567     
01568     RIG_findHead(rg);
01569 
01570     BLI_markdownSymmetry((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)rg->head, scene->toolsettings->skgen_symmetry_limit);
01571     
01572     RIG_reconnectControlBones(rg); /* after symmetry, because we use levels to find best match */
01573     
01574     if (BLI_isGraphCyclic((BGraph*)rg))
01575     {
01576         printf("armature cyclic\n");
01577     }
01578     
01579     return rg;
01580 }
01581 
01582 static RigGraph *armatureSelectedToGraph(bContext *C, Object *ob, bArmature *arm)
01583 {
01584     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01585     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01586     EditBone *ebone;
01587     RigGraph *rg;
01588 
01589     rg = newRigGraph();
01590     
01591     if (obedit == ob)
01592     {
01593         rg->editbones = arm->edbo;
01594     }
01595     else
01596     {
01597         rg->editbones = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ListBase), "EditBones");
01598         make_boneList(rg->editbones, &arm->bonebase, NULL, NULL);
01599         rg->flag |= RIG_FREE_BONELIST;
01600     }
01601 
01602     rg->ob = ob;
01603 
01604     /* Do the rotations */
01605     for (ebone = rg->editbones->first; ebone; ebone=ebone->next) {
01606         if (ebone->parent == NULL)
01607         {

01609         }
01610     }
01611

01613     
01614     RIG_removeNormalNodes(rg);
01615     
01616     RIG_removeUneededOffsets(rg);
01617     
01618     BLI_buildAdjacencyList((BGraph*)rg);
01619     
01620     RIG_findHead(rg);
01621 
01622     BLI_markdownSymmetry((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)rg->head, scene->toolsettings->skgen_symmetry_limit);
01623     
01624     RIG_reconnectControlBones(rg); /* after symmetry, because we use levels to find best match */
01625     
01626     if (BLI_isGraphCyclic((BGraph*)rg))
01627     {
01628         printf("armature cyclic\n");
01629     }
01630     
01631     return rg;
01632 }

01695 static void generateMissingArcs(RigGraph *rigg)
01696 {
01697     ReebGraph *reebg;
01698     int multi_level_limit = 5;
01699     
01700     for (reebg = rigg->link_mesh; reebg; reebg = reebg->link_up)
01701     {
01702         ReebArc *earc;
01703         
01704         for (earc = reebg->arcs.first; earc; earc = earc->next)
01705         {
01706             if (earc->flag == ARC_USED)
01707             {
01708                 generateMissingArcsFromNode(rigg, earc->head, multi_level_limit);
01709                 generateMissingArcsFromNode(rigg, earc->tail, multi_level_limit);
01710             }
01711         }
01712     }
