01716 /************************************ RETARGETTING *****************************************************/
01717 
01718 static void repositionControl(RigGraph *rigg, RigControl *ctrl, float head[3], float tail[3], float qrot[4], float resize);
01719 
01720 static void repositionTailControl(RigGraph *rigg, RigControl *ctrl);
01721 
01722 static void finalizeControl(RigGraph *rigg, RigControl *ctrl, float resize)
01723 {
01724     if ((ctrl->flag & RIG_CTRL_DONE) == RIG_CTRL_DONE)
01725     {
01726         RigControl *ctrl_child;
01727 
01728 #if 0       
01729         printf("CTRL: %s LINK: %s", ctrl->bone->name, ctrl->link->name);
01730         
01731         if (ctrl->link_tail)
01732         {
01733             printf(" TAIL: %s", ctrl->link_tail->name);
01734         }
01735         
01736         printf("\n");
01737 #endif
01738         
01739         /* if there was a tail link: apply link, recalc resize factor and qrot */
01740         if (ctrl->tail_mode != TL_NONE)
01741         {
01742             float *tail_vec = NULL;
01743             float v1[3], v2[3], qtail[4];
01744             
01745             if (ctrl->tail_mode == TL_TAIL)
01746             {
01747                 tail_vec = ctrl->link_tail->tail;
01748             }
01749             else if (ctrl->tail_mode == TL_HEAD)
01750             {
01751                 tail_vec = ctrl->link_tail->head;
01752             }
01753             
01754             sub_v3_v3v3(v1, ctrl->bone->tail, ctrl->bone->head);
01755             sub_v3_v3v3(v2, tail_vec, ctrl->bone->head);
01756             
01757             copy_v3_v3(ctrl->bone->tail, tail_vec);
01758             
01759             rotation_between_vecs_to_quat(qtail, v1, v2);
01760             mul_qt_qtqt(ctrl->qrot, qtail, ctrl->qrot);
01761             
01762             resize = len_v3(v2) / len_v3v3(ctrl->head, ctrl->tail);
01763         }
01764         
01765         ctrl->bone->roll = rollBoneByQuat(ctrl->bone, ctrl->up_axis, ctrl->qrot);
01766     
01767         /* Cascade to connected control bones */
01768         for (ctrl_child = rigg->controls.first; ctrl_child; ctrl_child = ctrl_child->next)
01769         {
01770             if (ctrl_child->link == ctrl->bone)
01771             {
01772                 repositionControl(rigg, ctrl_child, ctrl->bone->head, ctrl->bone->tail, ctrl->qrot, resize);
01773             }
01774             if (ctrl_child->link_tail == ctrl->bone)
01775             {
01776                 repositionTailControl(rigg, ctrl_child);
01777             }
01778         }
01779     }   
01780 }
01781 
01782 static void repositionTailControl(RigGraph *rigg, RigControl *ctrl)
01783 {
01784     ctrl->flag |= RIG_CTRL_TAIL_DONE;
01785 
01786     finalizeControl(rigg, ctrl, 1); /* resize will be recalculated anyway so we don't need it */
01787 }
01788 
01789 static void repositionControl(RigGraph *rigg, RigControl *ctrl, float head[3], float UNUSED(tail[3]), float qrot[4], float resize)
01790 {
01791     float parent_offset[3], tail_offset[3];
01792     
01793     copy_v3_v3(parent_offset, ctrl->offset);
01794     mul_v3_fl(parent_offset, resize);
01795     mul_qt_v3(qrot, parent_offset);
01796     
01797     add_v3_v3v3(ctrl->bone->head, head, parent_offset); 
01798 
01799     ctrl->flag |= RIG_CTRL_HEAD_DONE;
01800 
01801     copy_qt_qt(ctrl->qrot, qrot);
01802 
01803     if (ctrl->tail_mode == TL_NONE)
01804     {
01805         sub_v3_v3v3(tail_offset, ctrl->tail, ctrl->head);
01806         mul_v3_fl(tail_offset, resize);
01807         mul_qt_v3(qrot, tail_offset);
01808 
01809         add_v3_v3v3(ctrl->bone->tail, ctrl->bone->head, tail_offset);
01810         
01811         ctrl->flag |= RIG_CTRL_TAIL_DONE;
01812     }
01813 
01814     finalizeControl(rigg, ctrl, resize);
01815 }
01816 
01817 static void repositionBone(bContext *C, RigGraph *rigg, RigEdge *edge, float vec0[3], float vec1[3], float up_axis[3])
01818 {
01819     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01820     EditBone *bone;
01821     RigControl *ctrl;
01822     float qrot[4], resize;
01823     float v1[3], v2[3];
01824     float l1, l2;
01825     
01826     bone = edge->bone;
01827     
01828     sub_v3_v3v3(v1, edge->tail, edge->head);
01829     sub_v3_v3v3(v2, vec1, vec0);
01830     
01831     l1 = normalize_v3(v1);
01832     l2 = normalize_v3(v2);
01833 
01834     resize = l2 / l1;
01835     
01836     rotation_between_vecs_to_quat(qrot, v1, v2);
01837     
01838     copy_v3_v3(bone->head, vec0);
01839     copy_v3_v3(bone->tail, vec1);
01840     
01841     if (!is_zero_v3(up_axis))
01842     {
01843         float qroll[4];
01844 
01845         if (scene->toolsettings->skgen_retarget_roll == SK_RETARGET_ROLL_VIEW)
01846         {
01847             bone->roll = rollBoneByQuatAligned(bone, edge->up_axis, qrot, qroll, up_axis);
01848         }
01849         else if (scene->toolsettings->skgen_retarget_roll == SK_RETARGET_ROLL_JOINT)
01850         {
01851             bone->roll = rollBoneByQuatJoint(edge, edge->prev, qrot, qroll, up_axis);
01852         }
01853         else
01854         {
01855             unit_qt(qroll);
01856         }
01857         
01858         mul_qt_qtqt(qrot, qroll, qrot);
01859     }
01860     else
01861     {
01862         bone->roll = rollBoneByQuat(bone, edge->up_axis, qrot);
01863     }
01864 
01865     for (ctrl = rigg->controls.first; ctrl; ctrl = ctrl->next)
01866     {
01867         if (ctrl->link == bone)
01868         {
01869             repositionControl(rigg, ctrl, vec0, vec1, qrot, resize);
01870         }
01871         if (ctrl->link_tail == bone)
01872         {
01873             repositionTailControl(rigg, ctrl);
01874         }
01875     }
01876 }
01877 
01878 static RetargetMode detectArcRetargetMode(RigArc *arc);
01879 static void retargetArctoArcLength(bContext *C, RigGraph *rigg, RigArc *iarc, RigNode *inode_start);
01880 
01881 
01882 static RetargetMode detectArcRetargetMode(RigArc *iarc)
01883 {
01884     RetargetMode mode = RETARGET_AGGRESSIVE;
01885     ReebArc *earc = iarc->link_mesh;
01886     RigEdge *edge;
01887     int large_angle = 0;
01888     float avg_angle = 0;
01889     /* float avg_length = 0; */ /* UNUSED */
01890     int nb_edges = 0;
01891     
01892     
01893     for (edge = iarc->edges.first; edge; edge = edge->next)
01894     {
01895         avg_angle += edge->angle;
01896         nb_edges++;
01897     }
01898     
01899     avg_angle /= nb_edges - 1; /* -1 because last edge doesn't have an angle */
01900 
01901     /* avg_length = iarc->length / nb_edges; */  /* UNUSED */
01902     
01903     
01904     if (nb_edges > 2)
01905     {
01906         for (edge = iarc->edges.first; edge; edge = edge->next)
01907         {
01908             if (fabs(edge->angle - avg_angle) > M_PI / 6)
01909             {
01910                 large_angle = 1;
01911             }
01912         }
01913     }
01914     else if (nb_edges == 2 && avg_angle > 0)
01915     {
01916         large_angle = 1;
01917     }
01918         
01919     
01920     if (large_angle == 0)
01921     {
01922         mode = RETARGET_LENGTH;
01923     }
01924     
01925     if (earc->bcount <= (iarc->count - 1))
01926     {
01927         mode = RETARGET_LENGTH;
01928     }
01929     
01930     return mode;
01931 }
01932 
01933 #ifndef USE_THREADS
01934 static void printMovesNeeded(int *positions, int nb_positions)
01935 {
01936     int moves = 0;
01937     int i;
01938     
01939     for (i = 0; i < nb_positions; i++)
01940     {
01941         moves += positions[i] - (i + 1);
01942     }
01943     
01944     printf("%i moves needed\n", moves);
01945 }
01946 
01947 static void printPositions(int *positions, int nb_positions)
01948 {
01949     int i;
01950     
01951     for (i = 0; i < nb_positions; i++)
01952     {
01953         printf("%i ", positions[i]);
01954     }
01955     printf("\n");
01956 }
01957 #endif
01958 
01959 #define MAX_COST FLT_MAX /* FIX ME */
01960 
01961 static float costDistance(BArcIterator *iter, float *vec0, float *vec1, int i0, int i1, float distance_weight)
01962 {
01963     EmbedBucket *bucket = NULL;
01964     float max_dist = 0;
01965     float v1[3], v2[3], c[3];
01966     float v1_inpf;
01967 
01968     if (distance_weight > 0)
01969     {
01970         sub_v3_v3v3(v1, vec0, vec1);
01971         
01972         v1_inpf = dot_v3v3(v1, v1);
01973         
01974         if (v1_inpf > 0)
01975         {
01976             int j;
01977             for (j = i0 + 1; j < i1 - 1; j++)
01978             {
01979                 float dist;
01980                 
01981                 bucket = IT_peek(iter, j);
01982     
01983                 sub_v3_v3v3(v2, bucket->p, vec1);
01984         
01985                 cross_v3_v3v3(c, v1, v2);
01986                 
01987                 dist = dot_v3v3(c, c) / v1_inpf;
01988                 
01989                 max_dist = dist > max_dist ? dist : max_dist;
01990             }
01991             
01992             return distance_weight * max_dist;
01993         }
01994         else
01995         {
01996             return MAX_COST;
01997         }
01998     }
01999     else
02000     {
02001         return 0;
02002     }
02003 }
02004 
02005 static float costAngle(float original_angle, float vec_first[3], float vec_second[3], float angle_weight)
02006 {
02007     if (angle_weight > 0)
02008     {
02009         float current_angle;
02010         
02011         if (!is_zero_v3(vec_first) && !is_zero_v3(vec_second))
02012         {
02013             current_angle = saacos(dot_v3v3(vec_first, vec_second));
02014 
02015             return angle_weight * fabsf(current_angle - original_angle);
02016         }
02017         else
02018         {
02019             return angle_weight * (float)M_PI;
02020         }
02021     }
02022     else
02023     {
02024         return 0;
02025     }
02026 }
02027 
02028 static float costLength(float original_length, float current_length, float length_weight)
02029 {
02030     if (current_length == 0)
02031     {
02032         return MAX_COST;
02033     }
02034     else
02035     {
02036         float length_ratio = fabs((current_length - original_length) / original_length);
02037         return length_weight * length_ratio * length_ratio;
02038     }
02039 }
02040 
02041 #if 0
02042 static float calcCostLengthDistance(BArcIterator *iter, float **vec_cache, RigEdge *edge, float *vec1, float *vec2, int i1, int i2)
02043 {
02044     float vec[3];
02045     float length;
02046 
02047     sub_v3_v3v3(vec, vec2, vec1);
02048     length = normalize_v3(vec);
02049 
02050     return costLength(edge->length, length) + costDistance(iter, vec1, vec2, i1, i2);
02051 }
02052 #endif
02053 
02054 static float calcCostAngleLengthDistance(BArcIterator *iter, float **UNUSED(vec_cache), RigEdge *edge, float *vec0, float *vec1, float *vec2, int i1, int i2, float angle_weight, float length_weight, float distance_weight)
02055 {
02056     float vec_second[3], vec_first[3];
02057     float length2;
02058     float new_cost = 0;
02059 
02060     sub_v3_v3v3(vec_second, vec2, vec1);
02061     length2 = normalize_v3(vec_second);
02062 
02063 
02064     /* Angle cost */    
02065     if (edge->prev)
02066     {
02067         sub_v3_v3v3(vec_first, vec1, vec0); 
02068         normalize_v3(vec_first);
02069         
02070         new_cost += costAngle(edge->prev->angle, vec_first, vec_second, angle_weight);
02071     }
02072 
02073     /* Length cost */
02074     new_cost += costLength(edge->length, length2, length_weight);
02075 
02076     /* Distance cost */
02077     new_cost += costDistance(iter, vec1, vec2, i1, i2, distance_weight);
02078 
02079     return new_cost;
02080 }
02081 
02082 static int indexMemoNode(int nb_positions, int previous, int current, int joints_left)
02083 {
02084     return joints_left * nb_positions * nb_positions + current * nb_positions + previous;
02085 }
02086 
02087 static void copyMemoPositions(int *positions, MemoNode *table, int nb_positions, int joints_left)
02088 {
02089     int previous = 0, current = 0;
02090     int i = 0;
02091     
02092     for (i = 0; joints_left > 0; joints_left--, i++)
02093     {
02094         MemoNode *node;
02095         node = table + indexMemoNode(nb_positions, previous, current, joints_left);
02096         
02097         positions[i] = node->next;
02098         
02099         previous = current;
02100         current = node->next;
02101     }
02102 }
02103 
02104 static MemoNode * solveJoints(MemoNode *table, BArcIterator *iter, float **vec_cache, int nb_joints, int nb_positions, int previous, int current, RigEdge *edge, int joints_left, float angle_weight, float length_weight, float distance_weight)
02105 {
02106     MemoNode *node;
02107     int index = indexMemoNode(nb_positions, previous, current, joints_left);
02108     
02109     node = table + index;
02110     
02111     if (node->weight != 0)
02112     {
02113         return node;
02114     }
02115     else if (joints_left == 0)
02116     {
02117         float *vec0 = vec_cache[previous];
02118         float *vec1 = vec_cache[current];
02119         float *vec2 = vec_cache[nb_positions + 1];
02120 
02121         node->weight = calcCostAngleLengthDistance(iter, vec_cache, edge, vec0, vec1, vec2, current, iter->length, angle_weight, length_weight, distance_weight);
02122 
02123         return node;
02124     }
02125     else
02126     {
02127         MemoNode *min_node = NULL;
02128         float *vec0 = vec_cache[previous];
02129         float *vec1 = vec_cache[current];
02130         float min_weight= 0.0f;
02131         int min_next= 0;
02132         int next;
02133         
02134         for (next = current + 1; next <= nb_positions - (joints_left - 1); next++)
02135         {
02136             MemoNode *next_node;
02137             float *vec2 = vec_cache[next];
02138             float weight = 0.0f;
02139             
02140             /* ADD WEIGHT OF PREVIOUS - CURRENT - NEXT triple */
02141             weight = calcCostAngleLengthDistance(iter, vec_cache, edge, vec0, vec1, vec2, current, next, angle_weight, length_weight, distance_weight);
02142             
02143             if (weight >= MAX_COST)
02144             {
02145                 continue;
02146             }
02147             
02148             /* add node weight */
02149             next_node = solveJoints(table, iter, vec_cache, nb_joints, nb_positions, current, next, edge->next, joints_left - 1, angle_weight, length_weight, distance_weight);
02150             weight += next_node->weight;
02151             
02152             if (min_node == NULL || weight < min_weight)
02153             {
02154                 min_weight = weight;
02155                 min_node = next_node;
02156                 min_next = next;
02157             }
02158         }
02159         
02160         if (min_node)
02161         {
02162             node->weight = min_weight;
02163             node->next = min_next;
02164             return node;
02165         }
02166         else
02167         {
02168             node->weight = MAX_COST;
02169             return node;
02170         }
02171     }
02172     
02173 }
02174 
02175 static int testFlipArc(RigArc *iarc, RigNode *inode_start)
02176 {
02177     ReebArc *earc = iarc->link_mesh;
02178     ReebNode *enode_start = BIF_NodeFromIndex(earc, inode_start->link_mesh);
02179     
02180     /* no flip needed if both nodes are the same */
02181     if ((enode_start == earc->head && inode_start == iarc->head) || (enode_start == earc->tail && inode_start == iarc->tail))
02182     {
02183         return 0;
02184     }
02185     else
02186     {
02187         return 1;
02188     }
02189 }
02190 
02191 static void retargetArctoArcAggresive(bContext *C, RigGraph *rigg, RigArc *iarc, RigNode *inode_start)
02192 {
02193     ReebArcIterator arc_iter;
02194     BArcIterator *iter = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter;
02195     RigEdge *edge;
02196     EmbedBucket *bucket = NULL;
02197     ReebNode *node_start, *node_end;
02198     ReebArc *earc = iarc->link_mesh;
02199     float angle_weight = 1.0; // GET FROM CONTEXT
02200     float length_weight = 1.0;
02201     float distance_weight = 1.0;
02202 #ifndef USE_THREADS
02203     float min_cost = FLT_MAX;
02204 #endif
02205     float *vec0, *vec1;
02206     int *best_positions;
02207     int nb_edges = BLI_countlist(&iarc->edges);
02208     int nb_joints = nb_edges - 1;
02209     RetargetMethod method = METHOD_MEMOIZE;
02210     int i;
02211     
02212     if (nb_joints > earc->bcount)
02213     {
02214         printf("NOT ENOUGH BUCKETS!\n");
02215         return;
02216     }
02217 
02218     best_positions = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * nb_joints, "Best positions");
02219     
02220     if (testFlipArc(iarc, inode_start))
02221     {
02222         node_start = earc->tail;
02223         node_end = earc->head;
02224     }
02225     else
02226     {
02227         node_start = earc->head;
02228         node_end = earc->tail;
02229     }
02230 
02231     /* equal number of joints and potential position, just fill them in */
02232     if (nb_joints == earc->bcount)
02233     {
02234         int i;
02235         
02236         /* init with first values */
02237         for (i = 0; i < nb_joints; i++)
02238         {
02239             best_positions[i] = i + 1;
02240         }
02241     }
02242     if (method == METHOD_MEMOIZE)
02243     {
02244         int nb_positions = earc->bcount;
02245         int nb_memo_nodes = nb_positions * nb_positions * (nb_joints + 1);
02246         MemoNode *table = MEM_callocN(nb_memo_nodes * sizeof(MemoNode), "memoization table");
02247 #ifndef USE_THREADS
02248         MemoNode *result;
02249 #endif
02250         float **positions_cache = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float*) * (nb_positions + 2), "positions cache");
02251         int i;
02252         
02253         positions_cache[0] = node_start->p;
02254         positions_cache[nb_positions + 1] = node_end->p;
02255         
02256         initArcIterator(iter, earc, node_start);
02257 
02258         for (i = 1; i <= nb_positions; i++)
02259         {
02260             EmbedBucket *bucket = IT_peek(iter, i);
02261             positions_cache[i] = bucket->p;
02262         }
02263 
02264 #ifndef USE_THREADS
02265         result = solveJoints(table, iter, positions_cache, nb_joints, earc->bcount, 0, 0, iarc->edges.first, nb_joints, angle_weight, length_weight, distance_weight);
02266         min_cost = result->weight;
02267 #else
02268         solveJoints(table, iter, positions_cache, nb_joints, earc->bcount, 0, 0, iarc->edges.first, nb_joints, angle_weight, length_weight, distance_weight);
02269 #endif
02270 
02271         copyMemoPositions(best_positions, table, earc->bcount, nb_joints);
02272 
02273         MEM_freeN(table);
02274         MEM_freeN(positions_cache);
02275     }
02276 
02277     vec0 = node_start->p;
02278     initArcIterator(iter, earc, node_start);
02279     
02280 #ifndef USE_THREADS
02281     printPositions(best_positions, nb_joints);
02282     printMovesNeeded(best_positions, nb_joints);
02283     printf("min_cost %f\n", min_cost);
02284     printf("buckets: %i\n", earc->bcount);
02285 #endif
02286 
02287     /* set joints to best position */
02288     for (edge = iarc->edges.first, i = 0;
02289          edge;
02290          edge = edge->next, i++)
02291     {
02292         float *no = NULL;
02293         if (i < nb_joints)
02294         {
02295             bucket = IT_peek(iter, best_positions[i]);
02296             vec1 = bucket->p;
02297             no = bucket->no;
02298         }
02299         else
02300         {
02301             vec1 = node_end->p;
02302             no = node_end->no;
02303         }
02304         
02305         if (edge->bone)
02306         {
02307             repositionBone(C, rigg, edge, vec0, vec1, no);
02308         }
02309         
02310         vec0 = vec1;
02311     }
02312 
02313     MEM_freeN(best_positions);
02314 }
02315 
02316 static void retargetArctoArcLength(bContext *C, RigGraph *rigg, RigArc *iarc, RigNode *inode_start)
02317 {
02318     ReebArcIterator arc_iter;
02319     BArcIterator *iter = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter;
02320     ReebArc *earc = iarc->link_mesh;
02321     ReebNode *node_start, *node_end;
02322     RigEdge *edge;
02323     EmbedBucket *bucket = NULL;
02324     float embedding_length = 0;
02325     float *vec0 = NULL;
02326     float *vec1 = NULL;
02327     float *previous_vec = NULL;
02328 
02329     
02330     if (testFlipArc(iarc, inode_start))
02331     {
02332         node_start = (ReebNode*)earc->tail;
02333         node_end = (ReebNode*)earc->head;
02334     }
02335     else
02336     {
02337         node_start = (ReebNode*)earc->head;
02338         node_end = (ReebNode*)earc->tail;
02339     }
02340     
02341     initArcIterator(iter, earc, node_start);
02342 
02343     bucket = IT_next(iter);
02344     
02345     vec0 = node_start->p;
02346     
02347     while (bucket != NULL)
02348     {
02349         vec1 = bucket->p;
02350         
02351         embedding_length += len_v3v3(vec0, vec1);
02352         
02353         vec0 = vec1;
02354         bucket = IT_next(iter);
02355     }
02356     
02357     embedding_length += len_v3v3(node_end->p, vec1);
02358     
02359     /* fit bones */
02360     initArcIterator(iter, earc, node_start);
02361 
02362     bucket = IT_next(iter);
02363 
02364     vec0 = node_start->p;
02365     previous_vec = vec0;
02366     vec1 = bucket->p;
02367     
02368     for (edge = iarc->edges.first; edge; edge = edge->next)
02369     {
02370         float new_bone_length = edge->length / iarc->length * embedding_length;
02371         float *no = NULL;
02372         float length = 0;
02373 
02374         while (bucket && new_bone_length > length)
02375         {
02376             length += len_v3v3(previous_vec, vec1);
02377             bucket = IT_next(iter);
02378             previous_vec = vec1;
02379             vec1 = bucket->p;
02380             no = bucket->no;
02381         }
02382         
02383         if (bucket == NULL)
02384         {
02385             vec1 = node_end->p;
02386             no = node_end->no;
02387         }
02388 
02389         /* no need to move virtual edges (space between unconnected bones) */       
02390         if (edge->bone)
02391         {
02392             repositionBone(C, rigg, edge, vec0, vec1, no);
02393         }
02394         
02395         vec0 = vec1;
02396         previous_vec = vec1;
02397     }
02398 }
02399 
02400 static void retargetArctoArc(bContext *C, RigGraph *rigg, RigArc *iarc, RigNode *inode_start)
02401 {
02402 #ifdef USE_THREADS
02403     RetargetParam *p = MEM_callocN(sizeof(RetargetParam), "RetargetParam");
02404     
02405     p->rigg = rigg;
02406     p->iarc = iarc;
02407     p->inode_start = inode_start;
02408     p->context = C;
02409     
02410     BLI_insert_work(rigg->worker, p);
02411 #else
02412     RetargetParam p;
02413 
02414     p.rigg = rigg;
02415     p.iarc = iarc;
02416     p.inode_start = inode_start;
02417     p.context = C;
02418     
02419     exec_retargetArctoArc(&p);
02420 #endif
02421 }
02422 
02423 void *exec_retargetArctoArc(void *param)
02424 {
02425     RetargetParam *p = (RetargetParam*)param;
02426     RigGraph *rigg = p->rigg;
02427     RigArc *iarc = p->iarc;
02428     bContext *C = p->context;   
02429     RigNode *inode_start = p->inode_start;
02430     ReebArc *earc = iarc->link_mesh;
02431     
02432     if (BLI_countlist(&iarc->edges) == 1)
02433     {
02434         RigEdge *edge = iarc->edges.first;
02435 
02436         if (testFlipArc(iarc, inode_start))
02437         {
02438             repositionBone(C, rigg, edge, earc->tail->p, earc->head->p, earc->head->no);
02439         }
02440         else
02441         {
02442             repositionBone(C, rigg, edge, earc->head->p, earc->tail->p, earc->tail->no);
02443         }
02444     }
02445     else
02446     {
02447         RetargetMode mode = detectArcRetargetMode(iarc);
02448         
02449         if (mode == RETARGET_AGGRESSIVE)
02450         {
02451             retargetArctoArcAggresive(C, rigg, iarc, inode_start);
02452         }
02453         else
02454         {       
02455             retargetArctoArcLength(C, rigg, iarc, inode_start);
02456         }
02457     }
02458 
02459 #ifdef USE_THREADS
02460     MEM_freeN(p);
02461 #endif
02462     
02463     return NULL;
02464 }
02465 
02466 static void matchMultiResolutionNode(RigGraph *rigg, RigNode *inode, ReebNode *top_node)
02467 {
02468     ReebNode *enode = top_node;
02469     ReebGraph *reebg = BIF_graphForMultiNode(rigg->link_mesh, enode);
02470     int ishape, eshape;
02471     
02472     ishape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)rigg, (BNode*)inode, NULL, 0) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02473     eshape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)reebg, (BNode*)enode, NULL, 0) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02474     
02475     inode->link_mesh = enode;
02476 
02477     while (ishape == eshape && enode->link_down)
02478     {
02479         inode->link_mesh = enode;
02480 
02481         enode = enode->link_down;
02482         reebg = BIF_graphForMultiNode(rigg->link_mesh, enode); /* replace with call to link_down once that exists */
02483         eshape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)reebg, (BNode*)enode, NULL, 0) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02484     } 
02485 }
02486 
02487 static void markMultiResolutionChildArc(ReebNode *end_enode, ReebNode *enode)
02488 {
02489     int i;
02490     
02491     for (i = 0; i < enode->degree; i++)
02492     {
02493         ReebArc *earc = (ReebArc*)enode->arcs[i];
02494         
02495         if (earc->flag == ARC_FREE)
02496         {
02497             earc->flag = ARC_TAKEN;
02498             
02499             if (earc->tail->degree > 1 && earc->tail != end_enode)
02500             {
02501                 markMultiResolutionChildArc(end_enode, earc->tail);
02502             }
02503             break;
02504         }
02505     }
02506 }
02507 
02508 static void markMultiResolutionArc(ReebArc *start_earc)
02509 {
02510     if (start_earc->link_up)
02511     {
02512         ReebArc *earc;
02513         for (earc = start_earc->link_up ; earc; earc = earc->link_up)
02514         {
02515             earc->flag = ARC_TAKEN;
02516             
02517             if (earc->tail->index != start_earc->tail->index)
02518             {
02519                 markMultiResolutionChildArc(earc->tail, earc->tail);
02520             }
02521         }
02522     }
02523 }
02524 
02525 static void matchMultiResolutionArc(RigGraph *rigg, RigNode *start_node, RigArc *next_iarc, ReebArc *next_earc)
02526 {
02527     ReebNode *enode = next_earc->head;
02528     ReebGraph *reebg = BIF_graphForMultiNode(rigg->link_mesh, enode);
02529     int ishape, eshape;
02530 
02531     ishape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)rigg, (BNode*)start_node, (BArc*)next_iarc, 1) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02532     eshape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)reebg, (BNode*)enode, (BArc*)next_earc, 1) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02533     
02534     while (ishape != eshape && next_earc->link_up)
02535     {
02536         next_earc->flag = ARC_TAKEN; // mark previous as taken, to prevent backtrack on lower levels
02537         
02538         next_earc = next_earc->link_up;
02539         reebg = reebg->link_up;
02540         enode = next_earc->head;
02541         eshape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)reebg, (BNode*)enode, (BArc*)next_earc, 1) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02542     } 
02543 
02544     next_earc->flag = ARC_USED;
02545     next_iarc->link_mesh = next_earc;
02546     
02547     /* mark all higher levels as taken too */
02548     markMultiResolutionArc(next_earc);
02549 //  while (next_earc->link_up)
02550 //  {
02551 //      next_earc = next_earc->link_up;
02552 //      next_earc->flag = ARC_TAKEN;
02553 //  }
02554 }
02555 
02556 static void matchMultiResolutionStartingNode(RigGraph *rigg, ReebGraph *reebg, RigNode *inode)
02557 {
02558     ReebNode *enode;
02559     int ishape, eshape;
02560     
02561     enode = reebg->nodes.first;
02562     
02563     ishape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)rigg, (BNode*)inode, NULL, 0) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02564     eshape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)rigg->link_mesh, (BNode*)enode, NULL, 0) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02565     
02566     while (ishape != eshape && reebg->link_up)
02567     {
02568         reebg = reebg->link_up;
02569         
02570         enode = reebg->nodes.first;
02571         
02572         eshape = BLI_subtreeShape((BGraph*)reebg, (BNode*)enode, NULL, 0) % SHAPE_LEVELS;
02573     } 
02574 
02575     inode->link_mesh = enode;
02576 }
02577 
02578 static void findCorrespondingArc(RigGraph *rigg, RigArc *start_arc, RigNode *start_node, RigArc *next_iarc, int root)
02579 {
02580     ReebNode *enode = start_node->link_mesh;
02581     ReebArc *next_earc;
02582     int symmetry_level = next_iarc->symmetry_level;
02583     int symmetry_group = next_iarc->symmetry_group;
02584     int symmetry_flag = next_iarc->symmetry_flag;
02585     int i;
02586     
02587     next_iarc->link_mesh = NULL;
02588         
02589 //  if (root)
02590 //  {
02591 //      printf("-----------------------\n");
02592 //      printf("MATCHING LIMB\n");
02593 //      RIG_printArcBones(next_iarc);
02594 //  }
02595     
02596     for (i = 0; i < enode->degree; i++)
02597     {
02598         next_earc = (ReebArc*)enode->arcs[i];
02599         
02600 //      if (next_earc->flag == ARC_FREE)
02601 //      {
02602 //          printf("candidate (level %i ?= %i) (flag %i ?= %i) (group %i ?= %i)\n",
02603 //          symmetry_level, next_earc->symmetry_level,
02604 //          symmetry_flag, next_earc->symmetry_flag, 
02605 //          symmetry_group, next_earc->symmetry_flag);
02606 //      }
02607         
02608         if (next_earc->flag == ARC_FREE &&
02609             next_earc->symmetry_flag == symmetry_flag &&
02610             next_earc->symmetry_group == symmetry_group &&
02611             next_earc->symmetry_level == symmetry_level)
02612         {
02613 //          printf("CORRESPONDING ARC FOUND\n");
02614 //          printf("flag %i -- level %i -- flag %i -- group %i\n", next_earc->flag, next_earc->symmetry_level, next_earc->symmetry_flag, next_earc->symmetry_group);
02615             
02616             matchMultiResolutionArc(rigg, start_node, next_iarc, next_earc);
02617             break;
02618         }
02619     }
02620     
02621     /* not found, try at higher nodes (lower node might have filtered internal arcs, messing shape of tree */
02622     if (next_iarc->link_mesh == NULL)
02623     {
02624 //      printf("NO CORRESPONDING ARC FOUND - GOING TO HIGHER LEVELS\n");
02625         
02626         if (enode->link_up)
02627         {
02628             start_node->link_mesh = enode->link_up;
02629             findCorrespondingArc(rigg, start_arc, start_node, next_iarc, 0);
02630         }
02631     }
02632 
02633     /* still not found, print debug info */
02634     if (root && next_iarc->link_mesh == NULL)
02635     {
02636         start_node->link_mesh = enode; /* linking back with root node */
02637         
02638 //      printf("NO CORRESPONDING ARC FOUND\n");
02639 //      RIG_printArcBones(next_iarc);
02640 //      
02641 //      printf("ON NODE %i, multilevel %i\n", enode->index, enode->multi_level);
02642 //      
02643 //      printf("LOOKING FOR\n");
02644 //      printf("flag %i -- level %i -- flag %i -- group %i\n", ARC_FREE, symmetry_level, symmetry_flag, symmetry_group);
02645 //      
02646 //      printf("CANDIDATES\n");
02647 //      for (i = 0; i < enode->degree; i++)
02648 //      {
02649 //          next_earc = (ReebArc*)enode->arcs[i];
02650 //          printf("flag %i -- level %i -- flag %i -- group %i\n", next_earc->flag, next_earc->symmetry_level, next_earc->symmetry_flag, next_earc->symmetry_group);
02651 //      }
02652         
02653         /* Emergency matching */
02654         for (i = 0; i < enode->degree; i++)
02655         {
02656             next_earc = (ReebArc*)enode->arcs[i];
02657             
02658             if (next_earc->flag == ARC_FREE && next_earc->symmetry_level == symmetry_level)
02659             {
02660 //              printf("USING:\n");
02661 //              printf("flag %i -- level %i -- flag %i -- group %i\n", next_earc->flag, next_earc->symmetry_level, next_earc->symmetry_flag, next_earc->symmetry_group);
02662                 matchMultiResolutionArc(rigg, start_node, next_iarc, next_earc);
02663                 break;
02664             }
02665         }
02666     }
02667 
02668 }
02669 
02670 static void retargetSubgraph(bContext *C, RigGraph *rigg, RigArc *start_arc, RigNode *start_node)
02671 {
02672     RigNode *inode = start_node;
02673     int i;
02674 
02675     /* no start arc on first node */
02676     if (start_arc)
02677     {       
02678         ReebNode *enode = start_node->link_mesh;
02679         ReebArc *earc = start_arc->link_mesh;
02680         
02681         retargetArctoArc(C, rigg, start_arc, start_node);
02682         
02683         enode = BIF_otherNodeFromIndex(earc, enode);
02684         inode = (RigNode*)BLI_otherNode((BArc*)start_arc, (BNode*)inode);
02685     
02686         /* match with lowest node with correct shape */
02687         matchMultiResolutionNode(rigg, inode, enode);
02688     }
02689     
02690     for (i = 0; i < inode->degree; i++)
02691     {
02692         RigArc *next_iarc = (RigArc*)inode->arcs[i];
02693         
02694         /* no back tracking */
02695         if (next_iarc != start_arc)
02696         {
02697             findCorrespondingArc(rigg, start_arc, inode, next_iarc, 1);
02698             if (next_iarc->link_mesh)
02699             {
02700                 retargetSubgraph(C, rigg, next_iarc, inode);
02701             }
02702         }
02703     }
02704 }
02705 
02706 static void finishRetarget(RigGraph *rigg)
02707 {
02708 #ifdef USE_THREADS
02709     BLI_end_worker(rigg->worker);
02710 #endif
02711 }
02712 
02713 static void adjustGraphs(bContext *C, RigGraph *rigg)
02714 {
02715     bArmature *arm= rigg->ob->data;
02716     RigArc *arc;
02717     
02718     for (arc = rigg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
02719     {
02720         if (arc->link_mesh)
02721         {
02722             retargetArctoArc(C, rigg, arc, arc->head);
02723         }
02724     }
02725 
02726     finishRetarget(rigg);
02727 
02728     /* Turn the list into an armature */
02729     arm->edbo = rigg->editbones;
02730     ED_armature_from_edit(rigg->ob);
02731     
02732     ED_undo_push(C, "Retarget Skeleton");
02733 }
02734 
02735 static void retargetGraphs(bContext *C, RigGraph *rigg)
02736 {
02737     bArmature *arm= rigg->ob->data;
02738     ReebGraph *reebg = rigg->link_mesh;
02739     RigNode *inode;
02740     
02741     /* flag all ReebArcs as free */
02742     BIF_flagMultiArcs(reebg, ARC_FREE);
02743     
02744     /* return to first level */
02745     inode = rigg->head;
02746     
02747     matchMultiResolutionStartingNode(rigg, reebg, inode);
02748 
02749     retargetSubgraph(C, rigg, NULL, inode);
02750     
02751     //generateMissingArcs(rigg);
02752     
02753     finishRetarget(rigg);
02754 
02755     /* Turn the list into an armature */
02756     arm->edbo = rigg->editbones;
02757     ED_armature_from_edit(rigg->ob);
02758 }
02759 
02760 const char *RIG_nameBone(RigGraph *rg, int arc_index, int bone_index)
02761 {
02762     RigArc *arc = BLI_findlink(&rg->arcs, arc_index);
02763     RigEdge *iedge;
02764 
02765     if (arc == NULL)
02766     {
02767         return "None";
02768     }
02769     
02770     if (bone_index == BLI_countlist(&arc->edges))
02771     {
02772         return "Last joint";
02773     }
02774 
02775     iedge = BLI_findlink(&arc->edges, bone_index);
02776     
02777     if (iedge == NULL)
02778     {
02779         return "Done";
02780     }
02781     
02782     if (iedge->bone == NULL)
02783     {
02784         return "Bone offset";
02785     }
02786     
02787     return iedge->bone->name;
02788 }
02789 
02790 int RIG_nbJoints(RigGraph *rg)
02791 {
02792     RigArc *arc;
02793     int total = 0;
02794     
02795     total += BLI_countlist(&rg->nodes);
02796     
02797     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
02798     {
02799         total += BLI_countlist(&arc->edges) - 1; /* -1 because end nodes are already counted */
02800     }
02801     
02802     return total;
02803 }
02804 
02805 static void BIF_freeRetarget(void)
02806 {
02807     if (GLOBAL_RIGG)
02808     {
02809         RIG_freeRigGraph((BGraph*)GLOBAL_RIGG);
02810         GLOBAL_RIGG = NULL;
02811     }
02812 }
02813 
02814 void BIF_retargetArmature(bContext *C)
02815 {
02816     ReebGraph *reebg;
02817     double start_time, end_time;
02818     double gstart_time, gend_time;
02819     double reeb_time, rig_time=0.0, retarget_time=0.0, total_time;
02820     
02821     gstart_time = start_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
02822     
02823     reebg = BIF_ReebGraphMultiFromEditMesh(C);
02824     
02825     end_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
02826     reeb_time = end_time - start_time;
02827     
02828     printf("Reeb Graph created\n");
02829 
02830     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
02831         Object *ob = base->object;
02832 
02833         if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE)
02834         {
02835             RigGraph *rigg;
02836             bArmature *arm;
02837 
02838             arm = ob->data;
02839         
02840             /* Put the armature into editmode */
02841             
02842         
02843             start_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
02844 
02845             rigg = RIG_graphFromArmature(C, ob, arm);
02846             
02847             end_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
02848             rig_time = end_time - start_time;
02849 
02850             printf("Armature graph created\n");
02851     
02852             //RIG_printGraph(rigg);
02853             
02854             rigg->link_mesh = reebg;
02855             
02856             printf("retargetting %s\n", ob->id.name);
02857             
02858             start_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
02859 
02860             retargetGraphs(C, rigg);
02861             
02862             end_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
02863             retarget_time = end_time - start_time;
02864 
02865             BIF_freeRetarget();
02866             
02867             GLOBAL_RIGG = rigg;
02868             
02869             break; /* only one armature at a time */
02870         }
02871     }
02872     CTX_DATA_END;
02873 
02874     
02875     gend_time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
02876 
02877     total_time = gend_time - gstart_time;
02878 
02879     printf("-----------\n");
02880     printf("runtime: \t%.3f\n", total_time);
02881     printf("reeb: \t\t%.3f (%.1f%%)\n", reeb_time, reeb_time / total_time * 100);
02882     printf("rig: \t\t%.3f (%.1f%%)\n", rig_time, rig_time / total_time * 100);
02883     printf("retarget: \t%.3f (%.1f%%)\n", retarget_time, retarget_time / total_time * 100);
02884     printf("-----------\n");
02885     
02886     ED_undo_push(C, "Retarget Skeleton");
02887 
02888     // XXX  
02889 //  allqueue(REDRAWVIEW3D, 0);
02890 }
02891 
02892 void BIF_retargetArc(bContext *C, ReebArc *earc, RigGraph *template_rigg)
02893 {
02894     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02895     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02896     bArmature *armedit = obedit->data;
02897     Object *ob;
02898     RigGraph *rigg;
02899     RigArc *iarc;
02900     char *side_string = scene->toolsettings->skgen_side_string;
02901     char *num_string = scene->toolsettings->skgen_num_string;
02902     int free_template = 0;
02903     
02904     if (template_rigg) {
02905         ob = template_rigg->ob;
02906     }
02907     else {
02908         free_template = 1;
02909         ob = obedit;
02910         template_rigg = armatureSelectedToGraph(C, ob, ob->data);
02911     }
02912     
02913     if (template_rigg->arcs.first == NULL)
02914     {
02915 //      XXX
02916 //      error("No Template and no deforming bones selected");
02917         return;
02918     }
02919     
02920     rigg = cloneRigGraph(template_rigg, armedit->edbo, obedit, side_string, num_string);
02921     
02922     iarc = rigg->arcs.first;
02923     
02924     iarc->link_mesh = earc;
02925     iarc->head->link_mesh = earc->head;
02926     iarc->tail->link_mesh = earc->tail;
02927     
02928     retargetArctoArc(C, rigg, iarc, iarc->head);
02929     
02930     finishRetarget(rigg);
02931     
02932     /* free template if it comes from the edit armature */
02933     if (free_template)
02934     {
02935         RIG_freeRigGraph((BGraph*)template_rigg);
02936     }
02937     RIG_freeRigGraph((BGraph*)rigg);
02938     
02939     ED_armature_validate_active(armedit);
02940 
02941 //  XXX
02942 //  allqueue(REDRAWVIEW3D, 0);
02943 }
02944 
02945 void BIF_adjustRetarget(bContext *C)
02946 {
02947     if (GLOBAL_RIGG)
02948     {
02949         adjustGraphs(C, GLOBAL_RIGG);
02950     }
02951 }
